trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: ili
trans-unit.note: Line: 1064 Comment: Special case for Product : either one or the other. Not both.

trans-unit.source: Use this option to associate data (products, modules, etc.) the same way for each selected shop.
trans-unit.target: Koristite ovu opciju za dijeljene podataka (proizvodi, moduli itd.) na isti način za sve odabrane trgovine.

trans-unit.source: Click here to display the shops in the %name% shop group
trans-unit.target: Kliknite ovdje za prikaz trgovina u %name% grupi trgovina

trans-unit.source: Click here to display the URLs of the %name% shop
trans-unit.target: Kliknite ovdje za prikaz URL-ova %name% trgovine

trans-unit.source: Click here to display the list of shop groups
trans-unit.target: Kliknite ovdje za prikaz popisa grupa trgovina

trans-unit.source: Once this option is enabled, the shops in this group will share customers. If a customer registers in any one of these shops, the account will automatically be available in the others shops of this group.
trans-unit.target: Jednom kada je ova opcija omogućena, trgovine u ovoj grupi će dijeliti kupce. Ako je kupac registriran u bilo kojoj od tih trgovina, njegov račun će automatski biti dostupan i u drugim trgovinama ove grupe.

trans-unit.source: Once this option is enabled (which is only possible if customers and available quantities are shared among shops), the customer's cart will be shared by all shops in this group. This way, any purchase started in one shop will be able to be completed in another shop from the same group.
trans-unit.target: Kada je ova opcija omogućena (što je moguće samo onda ako su kupci i dostupne količine dijeljene između trgovina), korpa kupca će biti dijeljena sa svim trgovinama u ovoj grupi. Na taj način, bilo koja kupnja koja je započela u jednoj trgovini moći će se dovršiti u drugoj trgovini iz iste grupe.

trans-unit.source: Warning: You will not be able to disable this option once you've started to accept orders.
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje: Nećete moći onemogućiti ovu opciju kada se jednom krene s narudžbama.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable this shop group?
trans-unit.target: Omogući ili onemogući ovu grupu?

trans-unit.source: If you want to add a virtual URL, you need to activate URL rewriting on your web server and enable Friendly URL option.
trans-unit.target: Ako želite dodati virtualni URL, morate aktivirati URL prepisivanje na web serveru i omogućiti opciju prijateljski URL.

trans-unit.source: You can use this option if you want to create a store with a URL that doesn't exist on your server (e.g. if you want your store to be available with the URL www.example.com/my-store/shoes/, you have to set shoes/ in this field, assuming that my-store/ is your Physical URL).
trans-unit.target: Možete koristiti ovu opciju ukoliko želite kreirati trgovinu s URL-om koji ne postoji na vašem serveru (npr. ukoliko želite da vaša trgovina bude dostupna s URL www.trgovina.com/moja-trgovina/cipele/, morate postaviti cipele/ u ovo polje, uz pretpostavku da je /moja-trgovina/ fizički URL).

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting must be activated on your server to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: Za korištenje ove mogućnosti URL prepisivanje mora biti aktivirano na vašem serveru.

trans-unit.source: If you set this URL as the Main URL for the selected shop, all URLs set to this shop will be redirected to this URL (you can only have one Main URL per shop).
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko postavite ovaj URL kao glavni URL za odabranu trgovinu, svi URL-ovi podešeni za ovu trgovinu bit će preusmjereni na ovaj URL (možete imati samo jedan glavni URL po trgovini).

trans-unit.source: Since the selected shop has no main URL, you have to set this URL as the Main URL.
trans-unit.target: S obzirom da odabrana trgovina nema glavni URL, možete postaviti ovaj URL kao glavni URL.

trans-unit.source: The selected shop already has a Main URL. Therefore, if you set this one as the Main URL, the older Main URL will be set as a regular URL.
trans-unit.target: Odabrana trgovina već ima glavni URL. Stoga, ako postavite ovaj kao glavni URL, stari glavni URL biti će postavljen kao normalan URL.

trans-unit.source: This is the physical folder for your store on the web server. Leave this field empty if your store is installed on the root path. For instance, if your store is available at www.example.com/my-store/, you must input my-store/ in this field.
trans-unit.target: Ovo je fizički direktorij na web serveru za vašu trgovinu. Ostavite ovo polje prazno ako je vaša trgovina instalirana u korjenski direktorij. Na primjer, ako je vaša trgovina dostupna na www.example.com/my-store/, morate upisati my-store/ u ovo polje.

trans-unit.source: Warning: URL rewriting (e.g. mod_rewrite for Apache) seems to be disabled. If your Virtual URL doesn't work, please check with your hosting provider on how to activate URL rewriting.
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje: URL prepisivanje (npr. mod_rewrite za Apache) je izgleda neaktivan. Ako vaš virtualni URL ne radi, molimo provjerite s vašim hosting dobavljačem kako aktivirati URL prepisivanje.

trans-unit.source: Ignore this field if you don't use the Multistore tool. If you leave this field empty, the default shop will be used.
trans-unit.target: Zanemarite ovo polje ukoliko ne koristite alat Multi-trgovina. Ukoliko ostavite ovo polje praznim, koristiti će se zadana trgovina.

trans-unit.source: A category root is where a category tree can begin. This is used with multistore.
trans-unit.target: Korijenska kategorija je kategorija od koje počinje stablo. Ovo se koristi kod multi-trgovina.

trans-unit.source: Enable Advanced Stock Management on product (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
trans-unit.target: Omogućite napredna upravljanja zalihama proizvoda (0 = Ne, 1 = Da)

trans-unit.source: 0 = Use quantity set in product, 1 = Use quantity from warehouse.
trans-unit.target: 0 = Koristi količinu postavljenu uz proizvod, 1 = koristi količinu iz skladišta.

trans-unit.source: ID of the warehouse to set as storage.
trans-unit.target: ID spremišta postaviti kao skladište.

trans-unit.source: Enable Advanced Stock Management on product (0 = No, 1 = Yes).
trans-unit.target: Omogućite Napredna upravljanja zalihama proizvoda (0 = Ne, 1 = Da).

trans-unit.source: This will add directives to your .htaccess file, which should improve caching and compression.
trans-unit.target: Ovo će dodati direktive u vašu .htaccess datoteku koje bi trebale unaprijediti keširanje i kompresiju.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable debug mode.
trans-unit.target: Omogući ili onemogući mod debagiranja.

trans-unit.source: Name of the second domain of your shop, (e.g. myshop-media-server-1.com). If you do not have another domain, leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: Naziv druge domene Vaše trgovine, (npr. moja-trgovina-media-server-1.com). Ukoliko nemate drugu domenu, ostavite ovo polje praznim.

trans-unit.source: Name of the third domain of your shop, (e.g. myshop-media-server-2.com). If you do not have another domain, leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: Naziv druge domene Vaše trgovine, (npr. moja-trgovina-media-server-2.com). Ukoliko nemate drugu domenu, ostavite ovo polje praznim.

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" to disable Product Combinations.
trans-unit.target: Odaberite "Ne" za onemogućavanje Kombinacija proizvoda.

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this parameter to No when combinations are already used by some of your products
trans-unit.target: Ne možete postaviti ovaj parametar na "Ne" dok su kombinacije nekih proizvoda u upotrebi

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" to disable Product Features.
trans-unit.target: Odaberite "Ne" za onemogućavanje Kombinacija proizvoda.

trans-unit.source: Choose "No" to disable Customer Groups.
trans-unit.target: Odaberite "Ne" za onemogućavanje Grupa korisnika.

trans-unit.source: Should be enabled if you want to avoid to store the smarty cache on NFS.
trans-unit.target: Treba biti omogućeno ako želite izbjeći pohranu Smarty cache na NFS-a.

trans-unit.source: Check the IP address of the cookie in order to prevent your cookie from being stolen.
trans-unit.target: Provjeri IP adresu kolačića kako bi izbjegli krađu kolačića.

trans-unit.source: Set the amount of hours during which the front office cookies are valid. After that amount of time, the customer will have to log in again.
trans-unit.target: Podesite količinu sati tokom kojih vrijede kolačići na korisnisničkoj strani. Nakon toliko puno vremena, kupac će se morati ponovno prijaviti.

trans-unit.source: When you access your back office and decide to stay logged in, your cookies lifetime defines your browser session. Set here the number of hours during which you want them valid before logging in again.
trans-unit.target: Kad pristupite svom admin panelu i odlučite ostati prijavljeni, vijek trajanja kolačića određuje sesiju vašeg preglednika. Ovdje postavite broj sati tijekom kojih želite da budu valjani prije ponovne prijave.

trans-unit.source: Allows you to declare if your cookie should be restricted to a first-party or same-site context.
trans-unit.target: Dozvoljava vam da deklarišete ako će vaši kolačiće biti ograničeni prvom partneru ili sadržaju istog sajta.

trans-unit.source: Set the maximum size allowed for attachment files (in megabytes). This value has to be lower than or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server (currently: %size% MB).
trans-unit.target: Postavite maksimalnu veličinu dopuštenu za datoteka u prilogu (u megabajtima). Ova vrijednost mora biti manja ili jednaka maksimalnoj veličini uploada dodjeljenoj vašem serveru (trenutno: %size% MB).

trans-unit.source: Define the upload limit for a downloadable product (in megabytes). This value has to be lower or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server (currently: %size% MB).
trans-unit.target: Odrediti granicu za postavljanje preuzetih proizvoda (u MB). Ova vrijednost mora biti manja ili jednaka maksimalnom postavljanju datoteka koje su dodjeljene serveru (trenutno: %size% MB).

trans-unit.source: Define the upload limit for an image (in megabytes). This value has to be lower or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server (currently: %size% MB).
trans-unit.target: Odrediti granicu za prijenos slike (u MB). Ova vrijednost mora biti manja ili jednaka maksimalnom prijenosu datoteka koje su dodjeljene serveru (trenutno: %size% MB).

trans-unit.source: Drop existing tables during import.
trans-unit.target: Obriši postojeće tebele tokom uvoza.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the backup script will drop your tables prior to restoring data. (ie. "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS")
trans-unit.target: Ako je omogućeno, skripta za sigurnosnu kopiju će obrisati vaše tabele prije povrata podataka sigurnosne kopije. (npr. "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS")

trans-unit.source: Where customers send messages from the order page.
trans-unit.target: Gdje kupci šalju poruke sa stranice narudžbe.

trans-unit.source: Fully qualified domain name (keep this field empty if you don't know).
trans-unit.target: Potpuno kvalificirani naziv domene (ostavite prazno ako ne znate).

trans-unit.source: Leave blank if not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Ostavite prazno ako nije potrebno.

trans-unit.source: SSL does not seem to be available on your server.
trans-unit.target: Čini se da SSL nije dostupan na vašem serveru.

trans-unit.source: Port number to use.
trans-unit.target: Port broj koji se koristi.
npr. 1; Blouse; 129.90; 5

trans-unit.source: e.g. Blouse; red.jpg, blue.jpg, green.jpg; 129.90
trans-unit.target: npr. Blouse; red.jpg, blue.jpg, green.jpg; 129.90

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the product's reference number MUST be unique!
trans-unit.target: Ako je omogućeno, referentni broj proizvoda MORA biti jedinstven!

trans-unit.source: Enable this option to keep your imported items’ ID number as is. Otherwise, PrestaShop will ignore them and create auto-incremented ID numbers.
trans-unit.target: Omogućite ovu opciju da bi čuvali vaš uvezeni ID broj proizvoda. Inače PrestaShop će ignorisati taj broj i kreirati nove auto rastuće ID brojeve.

trans-unit.source: Receive an email when the import is complete. It can be useful when handling large files, as the import may take some time.
trans-unit.target: Primi e-mail kada je uvoz završen. To može biti korisno kada radite sa velikim fajlovima pošto import može da potraje neko vrijeme.

trans-unit.source: Click on "None" to disable log alerts by email or enter the recipients of these emails in the following field.
trans-unit.target: Kliknite na "Nijedan" da deaktivirate log obavještenja e-mailom ili unesite e-mail adresu od primaoca u ovo polje.

trans-unit.source: Log alerts will be sent to these emails. Please use a comma to separate them (e.g. pub@prestashop.com, anonymous@psgdpr.com).
trans-unit.target: Log obavještenja će biti poslana na ove e-mailove. Molimo koristite zarez za odvajanje e-mail adresa (npr. pub@prestashop.com, anonymous@psgdpr.com).

trans-unit.source: Before activating the webservice, you must be sure to:
trans-unit.target: Prije aktivacije web servisa, morate biti sigurni da:

trans-unit.source: Check that URL rewriting is available on this server.
trans-unit.target: Provjerite da li je URL rewriting omogućen na ovom serveru.

trans-unit.source: Before choosing "Yes", check that PHP is not configured as an Apache module on your server.
trans-unit.target: Prije odabira "Da", provjerite da PHP nije podešen kao Apache modul na vašem serveru.

trans-unit.source: Quick description of the key: who it is for, what permissions it has, etc.
trans-unit.target: Brzi opis ključa: za koga je, koje dozvole ima, itd.

trans-unit.source: Informative only
trans-unit.target: Samo informativno

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: Upozorenje

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Greška

trans-unit.source: Major issue (crash)!
trans-unit.target: Veliki problem (pad)!

trans-unit.source: How to restore a database backup in 10 easy steps
trans-unit.target: Kako vratiti sigurnosnu kopiju (backup) u 10 lakih koraka

trans-unit.source: Set "Enable Shop" to "No" in the "Maintenance" page under the "Preferences" menu.
trans-unit.target: Postavite "Omogući trgovinu" na "Ne" na stranici "Održavanje" pod menijem "Postavke".

trans-unit.source: Download the backup from the list below or from your FTP server (in the folder "admin/backups").
trans-unit.target: Preuzmite sigurnoste kopije iz popisa ispod ili s FTP servera (u direktoriju "admin/backups").

trans-unit.source: Check the backup integrity: Look for errors, incomplete file, etc... Be sure to verify all of your data.
trans-unit.target: Provjerite integritet sigurnosne kopije: potražite greške, nepotpune datoteke i sl. Provjerite sve svoje podatke.

trans-unit.source: Connect to "phpMyAdmin" and select your current database.
trans-unit.target: Spojite se u "phpMyAdmin" i odaberite trenutnu bazu.

trans-unit.source: Unless you enabled the "Drop existing tables" option, you must delete all tables from your current database.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko niste omogućili "Obriši postojeće tabele", morate obrisati sve tabele iz vaše trenutne baze podataka.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the screen, please select the "Import" tab
trans-unit.target: Na vrhu ekrana kliknite na tab "Uvoz"

trans-unit.source: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_browse_label%" button and select the backup file from your hard drive.
trans-unit.target: Kliknite na gumb "%phpmyadmin_browse_label%" i odaberite datoteku sigurnosne kopije s Vašeg diska.

trans-unit.source: Check the maximum filesize allowed (e.g. Max: 16MB)
trans-unit.target: Provjerite maks. dozvoljenu veličinu datoteke (npr. Max: 16MB)

trans-unit.source: If your backup file exceeds this limit, contact your hosting provider for assistance.
trans-unit.target: Ako vaša datoteka sigurnosne kopije prelazi tu granicu, kontaktirajte vašeg web provajdera usluge za pomoć.

trans-unit.source: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_go_label%" button and please wait patiently for the import process to conclude. This may take several minutes.
trans-unit.target: Kliknite na dugme "Kreni" i strpljivo čekajte da se proces učitavanja završi. To može potrajati nekoliko minuta.

trans-unit.source: You can read information on import at:
trans-unit.target: Možete pročitati informacije o uvozu na:

trans-unit.source: https://docs.prestashop-project.org/1.7-documentation/user-guide/configuring-shop/advanced-parameters/import
trans-unit.target: https://docs.prestashop-project.org/1.7-documentation/user-guide/configuring-shop/advanced-parameters/import

trans-unit.source: Read more about the CSV format at:
trans-unit.target: Pročitajte više o CSV formatu na:

trans-unit.source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values
trans-unit.target: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values

trans-unit.source: Allowed formats: .csv, .xls, .xlsx, .xlst, .ods, .ots
trans-unit.target: Dopušteni formati: .csv, .xls, .xlsx, .xlst, .ods, .ots

trans-unit.source: Only UTF-8 and ISO 8859-1 encodings are allowed
trans-unit.target: Samo UTF-8 i ISO-8859-1 formati su dozvoljeni

trans-unit.source: Password should be at least %num% characters long.
trans-unit.target: Lozinka mora biti najmanje %num% znakova duga.

trans-unit.source: Allow or disallow this employee to log in to the Admin panel.
trans-unit.target: Dozvoli ili ne dozvoli ovom zaposleniku prijavu u Admin panel.

trans-unit.source: Select the shops the employee is allowed to access.
trans-unit.target: Odaberi trgovine kojima zaposlenik ima pravo pristupa.

trans-unit.source: Severity levels
trans-unit.target: Nivoi ozbiljnosti

trans-unit.source: How do I create a new SQL query?
trans-unit.target: Kako kreirati novi SQL upit?

trans-unit.source: Click "%add_new_label%".
trans-unit.target: Kliknite "%add_new_label%".
trans-unit.note: Line: 34 Comment: Stable feature flags form

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields and click "%save_label%".
trans-unit.target: Popunite polja i kliknite na "Sačuvaj".

trans-unit.source: You can then view the query results by clicking on the "%view_label%" action in the dropdown menu
trans-unit.target: Možete vidjeti rezultat upita klikom na "%view_label%" u padajućem meniju

trans-unit.source: You can also export the query results as a CSV file by clicking on the "%export_label%" button
trans-unit.target: Također možete izvesti rezultat upita u CSV datoteku klikom na dugme "%export_label%"

trans-unit.source: Some features can be disabled in order to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Neke osobine mogu se onemogućiti kako bi poboljšali performanse.

trans-unit.source: CCC allows you to reduce the loading time of your page. With these settings you will gain performance without even touching the code of your theme. Make sure, however, that your theme is compatible with PrestaShop 1.7+. Otherwise, CCC will cause problems.
trans-unit.target: KKK am dozvoljava smanjenje vremena učitavanja vaše stranice. S ovim podešavanjima dobit ćete performanse bez diranja koda vaše teme. Osigurajte, ipak, da je vaša tema kompatibilna s PrestaShop 1.7+. Ukoliko nije, KKK bi mogao uzrokovati probleme.

trans-unit.source: This page benefits from increased performance and includes new features such as a new combination management system. Please note this is a work in progress and some features are not available yet.
trans-unit.target: Ova stranica ima koristi od poboljšanja performansi i uključuje nove funkcije kao što su nove kombinacije upravljanja sistemom. Molimo obratite pažnju da je rad na ovome još uvijek u procesu i da neke funkcije još nisu dostupne.
